name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 20, in Zhangjiakou, Hebei, local taxi drivers surrounded an online ride-hailing vehicle to protest against online ride-hailing vehicles stealing their business, demanding to check the evidence of the online ride-hailing vehicle and quarreled with a policeman.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
June 10-June 22, Shou County, Anhui. The owner of Shuangfeng Rice Mill went bankrupt after illegal private financing, and on May 31, he surrendered to the police. People who participated in the investment gathered at the rice mill to defend their rights.
According to a victim, the case involved more than 300 households and more than 30 million yuan in funds, all of which were the hard-earned money of ordinary people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Later, the suspension statement was deleted

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 21, Hunchun Bank announced the full resumption of its collection business with Russia.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
User contribution
According to Japanese statistics in 2021, in the country-by-country statistics of vehicles exercising diplomatic immunity in Japan, Russia ranked first with 1,826 times, accounting for 46.8% of the total, and China ranked second with 638 times, accounting for 16.6% of the total. The total number of all countries is 3,900 times.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 21, in response to the recent conflict between China and the Philippines in the South China Sea, the official Weibo account of the Public Security Bureau of the Ministry of Public Security of China posted a picture mocking the Filipinos as monkeys.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: 8964 work system: start work at 8 am and get off work at 9 pm, work 6 days a week, and earn 4,000 yuan a month.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 22 (Released) In Tongjinpu Town, Cili County, Hunan Province, a fight broke out between local motorcycle taxi drivers while competing for passengers, resulting in one death.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 22, Shantou, Guangdong. Locals said that the flood discharge was not notified by whistles, resulting in the unfortunate deaths of some people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 21, Fujian. Victims said that on the night of the 16th, a landslide buried houses and killed five people, but the government did not deal with it until the 21st.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: She County, Huangshan, Anhui Province, issued a Level 1 red alert for flash flood disasters on the evening of the 22nd.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
At present, the local police are searching for the suspect Huo Wenchang with all their strength, and there are helicopters in the air to participate in the search.
However, under the relevant video, netizens collectively expressed their support for Huo Wenchang, praying for the hero's safety and hoping that the police would not catch him.
On June 18, a major criminal case occurred in Ershijia Village, Tumote Left Banner, Hohhot, and five people were killed. After the incident, Huo Wenchang, who was a major suspect, absconded. It was rumored that the motive for the crime was suspected to be related to a land dispute.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 22, a netizen posted a message saying that Manner Coffee shop employees have countdowns for eating and going to the toilet, which sparked heated discussions.
According to reports, Manner Coffee was established in 2015, and as of June 10, 2024, the total number of stores has reached 1,295. According to the 2023 annual report of Inhe Industrial published by the National Enterprise Credit Information Publicity System, only 1,225 people at Manner paid five insurances last year.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, some Henan netizens reported that many places in Henan have reduced the number of teachers, and Zhengzhou has stopped recruiting.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @RonaldSimmonsUS You forgot that now is the time when the children born after the second and third child policy was implemented will go to school.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 22, a tourist was forcibly charged by herders for taking photos in Ruoergai County, Aba, Sichuan. Netizens said that they drove to the place to play, and there was no gate to the scenic area and no fee sign. There was only a billboard on the side of the road, which was marked with a very fine pencil that the fee was 20 yuan per person. Finally, the tourists called the police for help, and the herders agreed to charge only two people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Recently, a "electric vehicle height limit" barrier appeared on a street in Chongqing.
The adult man in the video had to bend down to barely pass the electric vehicle.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 22, the Wencheng County Health and Health Bureau of Wenzhou, Zhejiang Province, issued a statement of the situation, admitting that the decision to deduct unit and individual bonuses and performance from fraud victims was inappropriate and revoked. It also thanked the majority of netizens for their supervision of the work.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 22, local residents in Qiannan Buyi and Miao Autonomous Prefecture, Guizhou Province, filmed the falling of space debris. The video showed that the tail of the debris was trailing yellow smoke, and the smoke spread after it hit the ground.
In the video, someone reminded the villagers, "Don't post it, don't post what you took on Douyin"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 22, Guilin, Guangxi. Netizens took photos of merchants washing drinks soaked in water after the flood receded.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 22, Lianhe Zaobao reported that China's actual use of foreign capital in the first five months of this year fell 28.2% year-on-year, showing that the Chinese government still faces challenges in attracting overseas investment to boost the economy.
